Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An entity class to store related information about a Course. This Class is also hosting the ArrayList for Session and ArrayList for Assessment.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        courseName - String name of the course object being construct, for instance "Object Oriented Design and Programming".
        courseCode - String course code of the course object being construct, for instance CE2002
        AU - int AU of the course object being construct.
        courseCoordinator - String name of the overall coordinator of the course object being created.

      • addSession

        public boolean addSession()
                   throws EmptyInputException
        A method to add in new Session under the calling Course object (making use of ArrayList for storage).
        Returns:
        boolean false if the new Session object is not added, true if the new Session object is added
        Throws:
        EmptyInputException - if empty space is entered instead of information from users
        See Also:
        HashMap

      • modifySession

        public boolean modifySession​(Session session)
                      throws EmptyInputException,
                             java.util.InputMismatchException
        A method to modify information about existing Session.

        The method parse in the Session object need to be modified, following by accepting inputs from users to change the wanted field of information for that session.

        Parameters:
        session - The Session that need modification (for example changing any of the following: Type, Group ID, Timing, ...)
        Returns:
        boolean true if the modification is successful and false if otherwise.
        Throws:
        EmptyInputException - for empty input from the users.
        java.util.InputMismatchException - if the input given by users is mismatch with the data type required.

      • printIndexList

        public void printIndexList()
        An utility method to print out all Session existing under the calling Course object.

        This method traverse the ArrayList of sessions stored in the Course and print out the Session objects visited.

        See Also:
        ArrayList

        public Session getSession​(java.lang.String group,
                          java.lang.String type)
        A method to return a Session under the calling Course object
        Parameters:
        group - the group ID of the Session of interest
        type - the type of Session of interest (LEC, TUT or LAB)
        Returns:
        Session the session object of interest.

      • setAssessment

        public void setAssessment​(Assessment assessment)
        A method to store the Assessment information under the calling Course object.

        Making use of the ArrayList of Assessment by adding the parsed in Assessment object into it.

        Parameters:
        assessment - Assessment component of this Course object.
        See Also:
        ArrayList

      • registerStudent

        public int registerStudent​(Student student,
                           java.lang.String group,
                           java.lang.String type)
        A method to register Student into Session stored in this Course.

        This method take in Student object, the group and type of Session needed and then traverse the array of Session objects of the calling Course object and add the Student in by addStudent method from Session class.

        Parameters:
        student - the Student we need to register
        group - the group ID of the Session
        type - the type of the Session (LEC, TUT or LAB)
        Returns:
        int 0 if added successfully, -1 if full, -2 if student is inside -3 if group does not exist
        See Also:
        Session.addStudent(Student), ArrayList

      • deregisterStudent

        public int deregisterStudent​(Student student)
        A method to remove Student from all Session and erase his/her Assessment data under the calling Course object.

        This is done by first traversing the ArrayList of Session, getting the ArrayList of Student objects registered under each Session. Then we search for the matching Student in the current ArrayList of Student.

        If there is a valid, matching entry of Student, we remove that Student and update the number of Student registered under that Session. Else, continue until no more unvisited Student under the current Session.

        We then remove all the Assessment results of the Student by traversing and removing from the array list of hashmap that stored all result for the student for the course.

        Parameters:
        student - Student to be removed.
        Returns:
        int number of Session that the Student were removed from for debugging purpose.
        See Also:
        Session.getStudentRegistered(), Session.setNumberRegistered(int), Assessment.removeAssessmentResult(Student), ArrayList, HashMap

      • printSessions

        public void printSessions()
        A method to print out all Session and their current vacancy under the calling Course object

        Traverse the ArrayList of Session objects and print out the information needed.

        See Also:
        ArrayList

      • getAssessment

        public java.util.ArrayList<Assessment> getAssessment()
        A method to return the ArrayList of Assessment objects under the calling Course
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Assessment objects (each object correspond to 1 component such as Final exam, quiz, etc)
        See Also:
        ArrayList

      • studentRegistered

        public boolean studentRegistered​(Student student)
        A method to validate if Student is registered under the calling Course or not.
        Parameters:
        student - the object of Student who we are interest to know his status under this course
        Returns:
        boolean true if the Student is under the Course, else false is returned.

      • clearAssessments

        public void clearAssessments()
        A method to clear all Assessment objects/components under the Course.

        This is done my clearing the ArrayList of Assessment object under the Course.

        See Also:
        ArrayList

      • enterResults

        public void enterResults​(Assessment assessment,
                         Student student,
                         double marks)
        A method to store result of Student for an Assessment component under this Course.
        Parameters:
        assessment - the component that we need to store the result in (for instance finals, coursework, etc)
        student - the student who we need to key in result.
        marks - the grade of Student
        See Also:
        Assessment.storeAssessmentResult(Student, double)
